b:if.b:template-skin: body#layout{background-color:#fff4e5;border:1px solid #f7dab2;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;width:780px;margin:20px auto;padding:70px 36px 25px;position:relative}body#layout::before{content:"evomagz versi 6.4.0 (27 Februari 2024)";display:block;position:absolute;left:36px;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;background:#f9e8d5;padding:10px 10px;color:#795e41;top:19px}body#layout div.layout-title,body#layout div.layout-widget-description,body#layout .add_widget a{font-size:1em;overflow:hidden}body#layout div.section{background:transparent;margin:0 0 10px;padding:0;border:0;font-family:Arial,sans-serif}body#layout div.section h4{background:#b28850;color:#fff;text-transform:capitalize;font-weight:normal;padding:3px 10px;font-size:1em;line-height:18px;margin:15px 0 0;text-align:center}body#layout div.section>div{margin-top:5px}body#layout div.layout-widget-description{font-size:12px;font-size:.75rem;opacity:.7;display:none}body#layout .editlink.icon{top:15px}body#layout div.widget .widget-content{padding:15px 15px}body#layout #main{margin-bottom:10px}body#layout #main .Blog .widget-content{height:120px}body#layout #template-settings h4,body#layout #custom-css h4,body#layout #social-button h4,body#layout #navmenu1 h4,body#layout #navmenu h4,body#layout #bellow-header-widget h4,body#layout #bellow-header-widget2 h4,body#layout #iklan-tengah1 h4,body#layout #iklan-tengah2 h4,body#layout #iklan-atas h4,body#layout #iklan-bawah h4,body#layout #matched-content h4,body#layout #iklan-infeed h4,body#layout #labelrecentposts-container h4,body#layout #footer-wrapper h4,body#layout #navbar h4,body#layout #custom-javascript-footer h4{display:none}body#layout .template-settings,body#layout .custom-css,body#layout .custom-javascript-footer{width:300px;display:block}body#layout .template-settings div.widget .widget-content,body#layout .custom-css div.widget .widget-content,body#layout .custom-javascript-footer div.widget .widget-content{padding:8px 15px;background:#e4ffff}body#layout .template-settings div.layout-widget-description,body#layout .custom-css div.layout-widget-description,body#layout .custom-javascript-footer div.layout-widget-description{display:none}body#layout .template-settings .editlink.icon,body#layout .custom-css .editlink.icon,body#layout .custom-javascript-footer .editlink.icon{top:8px}body#layout #template-settings div.widget{margin-top:0}body#layout #iklan-tengah1,body#layout #iklan-tengah2,body#layout #iklan-atas,body#layout #iklan-bawah{padding:0 25px 0 0}body#layout #iklan-tengah1 div.widget .widget-content,body#layout #iklan-tengah2 div.widget .widget-content,body#layout #iklan-atas div.widget .widget-content,body#layout #iklan-bawah div.widget .widget-content{background:#eaffe9;padding:6px 15px}body#layout #iklan-tengah1 div.widget .widget-content .editlink.icon,body#layout #iklan-tengah2 div.widget .widget-content .editlink.icon,body#layout #iklan-atas div.widget .widget-content .editlink.icon,body#layout #iklan-bawah div.widget .widget-content .editlink.icon{top:5px}body#layout #matched-content{padding:0 25px 0 0}body#layout #matched-content div.widget .widget-content{background:#ffe9e9;padding:6px 15px}body#layout #matched-content div.widget .widget-content .editlink.icon{top:5px}body#layout #iklan-infeed{padding:0 25px 0 0}body#layout #iklan-infeed div.widget .widget-content{background:#e9e9ff;padding:6px 15px}body#layout #iklan-infeed div.widget .widget-content .editlink.icon{top:5px}body#layout #wrapper,body#layout #nav-wrap{overflow:unset;padding:0}body#layout #wrapper::after,body#layout #nav-wrap::after{clear:both;content:"";display:block}body#layout #navmenu1{width:377px;float:left}body#layout #social-button{width:377px;float:right}body#layout #header-wrapper{height:auto;position:unset}body#layout #header-wrapper::after{content:"";display:block;clear:both}body#layout #header{width:100%}body#layout #post-wrapper{float:left;width:69%}body#layout #post-wrapper .post-container,body#layout #post-wrapper #labelrecentposts-container{padding:0 25px 0 0}body#layout #labelrecentposts-container .labelrecentposts-item{float:left;width:48%}body#layout #labelrecentposts-container #labelrecentposts-item-1,body#layout #labelrecentposts-container #labelrecentposts-item-3,body#layout #labelrecentposts-container #labelrecentposts-item-5{margin-right:2%}body#layout #labelrecentposts-container #labelrecentposts-item-2,body#layout #labelrecentposts-container #labelrecentposts-item-4,body#layout #labelrecentposts-container #labelrecentposts-item-6{margin-left:2%}body#layout #sidebar-wrapper{float:right;width:31%}body#layout #sidebar-wrapper .sidebar-container{padding:0}body#layout #sidebar-wrapper .sidebar-sticky{z-index:0}body#layout #footer-widget:before{content:"";display:block;clear:both}body#layout #footer-widget .left{float:left;width:32%;margin-right:2%}body#layout #footer-widget .center{float:left;width:32%}body#layout #footer-widget .right{float:right;width:32%}body#layout #footer-widget::after{content:"";clear:both;display:block}body#layout #navbar{display:block;max-width:100%;margin:0 0 25px}body#layout #navbar::before{content:"Untuk mempercepat loading blog, klik edit dan nonaktifkan Navbar ==>>";position:absolute;bottom:20px;z-index:999;right:70px;color:#ae8349;font-size:12px;font-size:.75rem}body#layout #navbar .Navbar .widget-content{height:unset !important}body#layout #custom-javascript-footer{margin:0} /* CSS FOR LAYOUT */

b:with.value: data:view.isHomepage ? data:posts filter (post => post.id not in data:featuredPostIds) : data:posts
